General.Name: DE&T Co. Ltd
General.Description: DE&T Co., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of back-end process equipment of the semiconductor and flat panel display industries worldwide. It offers secondary batteries and equipment for secondary batteries; OLED, nano LED, and ETC display equipment; semiconductor equipment; and automobile electronics. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Cheonan, South Korea.
